import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Upload as UploadIcon, Link, FileText, Database, AlertCircle } from 'lucide-react'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; const Upload: React.FC = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState<'file' | 'api'>('file'); const [isUploading, setIsUploading] = useState(false); const handleFileUpload = async (event: React.ChangeEvent) => { const file = event.target.files?.[0]; if (!file) return; setIsUploading(true); // Simulate upload setTimeout(() => { setIsUploading(false); toast.success('File uploaded successfully!'); }, 2000); }; const handleApiSetup = async (event: React.FormEvent) => { event.preventDefault(); setIsUploading(true); // Simulate API setup setTimeout(() => { setIsUploading(false); toast.success('API ingestion setup successfully!'); }, 2000); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Data Upload & API Setup

Upload CSV/Excel files or configure API endpoints for data ingestion

{/* Tab Navigation */}

Upload Coastal Data

Upload CSV or Excel files containing coastal monitoring data

{/* Upload Progress */} {isUploading && (
Processing file...
)} {/* File Requirements */}

File Requirements

  • • Supported formats: CSV, Excel (.xlsx, .xls)
  • • Maximum file size: 50MB
  • • Required columns: timestamp, latitude, longitude
  • • Optional columns: tide_level, wave_height, wind_speed, etc.
  • • Data will be automatically analyzed for risk assessment
)} {/* API Setup Tab */} {activeTab === 'api' && (

API Endpoint Setup

Configure API endpoints for continuous data ingestion
